methods.name: set
methods.description: Trigger a model update; Validates model (and emits 'save' event if it's the case) then closes Popup

methods.name: cancel
methods.description: Triggers a model reset to its initial value ('cancel' event is emitted) then closes Popup

methods.name: updatePosition
methods.description: There are some custom scenarios for which Quasar cannot automatically reposition the component without significant performance drawbacks so the optimal solution is for you to call this method when you need it

events.name: update:model-value
events.description: Emitted when Popup gets cancelled in order to reset model to its initial value; Is also used by v-model

events.name: before-show
events.description: Emitted right before Popup gets shown

events.name: show
events.description: Emitted right after Popup gets shown

events.name: before-hide
events.description: Emitted right before Popup gets dismissed

events.name: hide
events.description: Emitted right after Popup gets dismissed

events.name: save
events.description: Emitted when value has been successfully validated and it should be saved

events.name: cancel
events.description: Emitted when user cancelled the change (hit ESC key or clicking outside of Popup or hit 'Cancel' button)

auto-save.description: Automatically save the model (if changed) when user clicks/taps outside of the popup; It does not apply to ESC key

color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
color.desc: Color name for component's track from the Quasar Color Palette

validate.description: Validates model then triggers 'save' and closes Popup; Returns a Boolean ('true' means valid, 'false' means abort); Syntax: validate(value); For best performance, reference it from your scope and do not define it inline

fit.description: Allows the menu to match at least the full width of its target

cover.description: Allows the menu to cover its target. When used, the 'self' and 'fit' props are no longer effective

anchor.description: Two values setting the starting position or anchor point of the menu relative to its target

self.description: Two values setting the menu's own position relative to its target

offset.description: An array of two numbers to offset the menu horizontally and vertically in pixels

touch-position.description: Allows for the target position to be set by the mouse position, when the target of the menu is either clicked or touched

persistent.description: Avoid menu closing by hitting ESC key or by clicking/tapping outside of the Popup

separate-close-popup.description: Separate from parent menu, marking it as a separate closing point for v-close-popup (without this, chained menus close all together)

square.description: Forces menu to have squared borders

max-height.desc: The maximum height of the menu; Size in CSS units, including unit name

max-width.desc: The maximum width of the menu; Size in CSS units, including unit name
